alert.note: Alert for Central and East Adams and Arapahoe Counties; Central and South Weld County; Morgan County; North Douglas County Below 6000 Feet, Denver, West Adams and Arapahoe Counties, East Broomfield County; Northeast Weld County (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 29 at 12:36AM MDT by NWS Boulder
info.description: ...A thunderstorm will impact portions of south central Weld, western Morgan and north central Adams Counties through 115 AM MDT... At 1235 AM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a thunderstorm 8 miles south of Prospect Valley, or 30 miles northeast of Denver, moving northeast at 30 mph near I-76. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Fort Morgan, Keenesburg, Wiggins, Log Lane Village, Orchard, Weldona, Prospect Valley, Jackson Reservoir, Riverside Reservoir, Goodrich and Roggen. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: Prepare for sudden gusty winds. Secure loose objects and move to a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
